content.en: Underwater image enhancement: Researchers have been investigating how algorithms can enhance underwater images and restore their quality. They have developed various approaches, such as fusion adversarial networks and dilated generative adversarial networks, which have shown promising results in improving the clarity, color correction, and overall visual quality of underwater images. These algorithms have been evaluated using real-world datasets and benchmarking techniques, and they have outperformed existing methods, providing a significant advancement in underwater image enhancement.
content.da: Undervandsbilledforbedring: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan algoritmer kan forbedre undervandsbilleder og genoprette deres kvalitet. De har udviklet forskellige tilgange, såsom fusion adversarielle netværk og dilaterede generative adversarielle netværk, som har vist lovende resultater i at forbedre klarheden, farvekorrigeringen og den overordnede visuelle kvalitet af undervandsbilleder. Disse algoritmer er blevet evalueret ved hjælp af virkelighedsdata og benchmarking-teknikker, og de har overgået eksisterende metoder, hvilket giver en betydelig fremgang i undervandsbilledforbedring.
